question: What is the position of India as per the report of 2017 Expedia Vacation Deprivation?
explanation: According to Expedia Vacation Deprivation Report 2017, India is the fifth most vacation deprived country. This report has been compiled on basis of an online survey conducted by Northstar Research Partners on behalf of Expedia, an international travel company.In the survey, 60 per cent Indian respondents admitted of being vacation deprived due to heavy work schedule.
